alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 8:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Camden, Glynn, northeastern Brantley and southeastern Wayne Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 836 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Everett to near Waverly. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Sea Island, Everett, Waynesville, Jekyll Island and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Wayne
